content: hey crafters today I want to show you a steam pump like boiler I did for one of
my games I had an old abandoned castle and the castle had was inhabited by
wizards so they created this heating system for the castle which would no
longer was operating but gave kind of a neat tactical thing to the party where
they could if they figured it out they can enter the enter one of the steam
ports and actually go down into the boiler like climbed out of the boiler
this is good for like Jeff a group that has a small character in it so uh let's
go to the table and I'll show you what I did
I show you my stuff with DM Scotty here's a room of an old castle that has
a steam port mechanical steam port and they figure out the gnome can actually
enter the steam port through the pipe and he can go down into the boiler so
let me show you look at this now I painted it metallic black with some
highlights of silver and the dial there I painted white and just painted all
those the gauge on there and everything and then put some gloss on there so
here's the boiler itself in the basement and he got the gnome coming out of there
he went through the pipes and you got the front load area there and you can
see all of the various pieces coming off there I have a few beads on there and I
paint it the same I use the metallic black and then I used the silver
highlighting so I think it came out really neat it's a really nice way to
kind of show like a magical boiler type thing that they would have used
there's the various woodsy shapes I used and you get all these at a craft store
they have on numerous types of interesting shapes now I used craft goop
to assemble these it's a really nice glue for a holding this kind of stuff
together here's a steam port in its raw form
and you can see I just assembled those woodsies in order to give it a look like
a steam port and I think that came out really nice
I went a little crazy with the boiler itself and you can see here all the
various woodsies I've applied I have some woodsies on top like pipes that are
leading up to the other levels I have some beads on there like look mechanical
like mechanical aspects of this and then I had the front hatch open where the
boiler would be loaded so I thought that was really neat and that's how I made
this stuff hey guys if you're interested in making interesting stuff for your
table make sure to check out the DMS craft I've got tons of videos on playing
on crafting stuff on making our signature 2.5 D tiles so go over to the
dams craft and check out all the cool videos
